𒀝 AGʳ/AKʳ/•ARᵍ/ᵍAR A₅ 𓄿 hawk
𒀞 querre/war 𓌖 AK x ERIN2 𒂟
𒀞 me₃ Metzel
𒀟 𒀝×𒋖𒄑 AK × ŠITA + GIŠ ≈ 𒀝·𒂷𒄑 𒀟

𒀝 act 𒆕 du acting / doING

𒀝 -que genitive case marker

𒀝 aguilla 𓄿 אוֹחַ óakh "eagle owl" 𒀝𒂵𒇻 ag-ga-lu agalu 'stag' complement

𓄿 eagle < 𓅀 αἰγυπιός aigupiós < γύψ gúps 𓅐

𒀝 ᵍAR ≈ 𓄿 h₃érō ≈ 𓅃 Hor 𒄷 ḪU® in 𓅃𓋞 nabu 𒀭𒀝 ≈ 𓅉

𒀝 ᵍAR guerre war 𒀞

𒀝 ᵍAR in 𒀝𒈬 AK-MU charm ⲭⲣⲱⲙ burn

𒀝 akᶥᵖ γύψ in 𒀝𒋢𒌓 akᶥᵖsuʳud captured

𒀝 akᶥᵈ kid3 ≈ 𒄾 KUŠ₈ ≈ 𒋺 kid2 ≈ 𒆤 kid 𒀝

𒀝 ša₅ snap off

𒄷 ḪU ಹಕ್ಕಿ hakki hawk 𒀝 *ʔak 𓄿 𓋴 𓅯 aǧ… •αἰγυπιός Egyptian Vulture
𒄷 ḫu *h₂aṷ-i- > *hawi •hawk 𒀝 ⇔ u8 𒇇

harpy <> rabe 𓄿 𓅃 𓅆 𓅂 in 𒀭𒀝 Nabu (a god)
𒀭𒉺 AN.PA Nabu

𒀭𒀝 Nabûᵏ 𓅉 Nabûʳ 𒀮 NAB Nabu 𒈾𒀊𒅕 napir 𓋞𓅃
𒀭𒀝 Nabûᵏ ⇔ 𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓏯 𓅭 ⲛⲟϣⲉⲣ vulture 𓆂 𓅒 𓅐 𓄿 𓅀 𓅁 𓄿
𒀭𒀝 Nabûᵏ ⇔ 𓏌 𓏌 𓏌 𓇯 𓀭 Neptune ≙ Poseidon 𓊪 𓏏 𓇯 𓀭 water hawk / falcon
𒀭𒀝 𒆪𒁺𒌨𒊑 𒋀 Nabû-kudurri-uṣur ("guard my heir" Nebuchadnesar Nebuchadnezzar
𒀭𒀝𒆪𒁺𒌨𒊑𒋀 נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּר Nəḇūḵaḏreʾṣṣar נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּר Nəḇūḵaḏneʾṣṣar נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּר Nəḇūḵaḏneṣṣar

𒀝𒅗𒁺𒌑 ak-ka-du-u2 Akkadia 𒌵𒆠 URI.KI 𓊖 !
𒀝 eagle prominent symbol

𒀠 al “hoe” 𒀠𒀝 al.ak “hoeing”

𒀝 aguilla 𓄿 אוֹחַ óakh "eagle owl" 𓅓

Inflection
Declension of *ʔak-
Descendants

Akkadian: 𒀝𒆪𒌋 (akkû) ("owl")  
Amharic: ጉጉት (gugut) ("owl")  
Aramaic:  

    Classical Syriac: ܟܘܟܒܝ (kawk(ə)ḇay) ("owl")  

Ge'ez: ኳኳ (kʷakʷa) ("raven")  
Hebrew: אוֹחַ (óakh) ("eagle owl")  
Tigrinya: ኳኵ (kʷakʷ) (kwakwǝ) ("crow, raven")

𒀝𒅗𒉡𒌝 ak-ka-nu-um "wild donkey" #akkannu > 𒀝𒃶𒉡 ak-kan-nu kunga ᵏonager ass

𒀝𒂵𒇻 ag-ga-lu
𒀝𒂵𒇻 deer, stag

𒀝𒈬𒊏 ag-mu-ra 𓆎 𓏛 akhmera "complete" 𒅅 𒈬𒊒 ig-mu-ru 𓆎 𓅓 𓏜
𒀝𒈬𒊏 ag-mu-ra 𓎼 𓂋 𓎛 𓂢 𓏛 "complete, finish" 𓂋 •mur
𒀝𒈬𒊏 ag-mu-ra 𓏏 𓍃 𓅓 "complete" •atjmura ⇔ 𓎛 𓏏 𓐬 𓋴 ⇔ 𓋴 𓆎 𓅓 𓀜 seghmura ⇔ 𓋴 𓂝 𓂋 𓈎 𓍼
𒀝𒈬𒊏 ag-mu-ra 𓏇 𓇋 𓐪 𓏥 √mira "completly" ⇔ maha ⇔ mega

𒀝𒁀𒀀 ag-ba-a gebat "spoke" ⇔ mighty?

𒃻𒀉𒃻 nig̃₂-a₂-g̃ar /nig̃'ag̃ar/ deception 𒃻𒀉𒃻𒂠𒀝 nig̃₂-a₂-g̃ar-še₃.ak /nig̃'ag̃arše ak/ ― to deceive (s.o. act)
